title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 409.14 - Cybersecurity
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 409.14 - Cybersecurity

State Regulations
(a) Every student
loan servicer, other than an exempt organization, is a Covered Entity under

Part 500 of title 23 and shall comply with that part. (b) A student loan servicer shall have until

April 9, 2020 to comply with Part 500 of title 23, except that a student loan
servicer shall have until October 9, 2020 to comply with the requirements of
sections 500.06, 500.08, 500.11, 500.13, 500.14(a) and 500.15 of that
part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3
ยง
409.14

Adopted

New

York State Register October 16, 2019/Volume XLI, Issue 42, eff. 10/16/2019

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
